title.narrative: Strengthening the Status of Education and Teachers

description.narrative: The main focus of the program is to strengthen the status and the quality of education and teachers as well as the role of teachers'union as an education advocate. A central goal of the program is to strengthen the role of the civil society. This is an edu cation program teachers are trained and activated towards union work and the objective is to enhance their skills in defending their rights in democracy and decision-making processes. Teachers are key persons in defending the role of the civil society deve loping education and the right for good education for all children. Teachers are also strong opinion makers so they can influence parents and families to respect education and strenghten girls' position in education system.The main methods to reach the pro gram goals are: education seminars training and meetings with the teachers at rural areas. The subjects of the training seminars are i.e. teachers rights and reponsibilities democracy processes in decision makingTogo's education guidelines ethical principa ls in the teaching profession.This program is continuation to program 2015-2017. To reach long-term and sustainable results in education it is important to continue teachers trade union training and hence strengthen the union's role in society. This progra m also produces information newletters for teachers. The goal of the program is also to improve the working conditions of the secretariat of FESEN. The secretariat of FESEN works on voluntary basis in addition to their duties as teachers and do not get pai d by the union for their input. FESEN as a teachers' union can only be strong and an independent operator in civil society if it has a sufficient number of membership fee paying members. The program is following UN:s 2030 agenda and targets 4 510 and 16.
